label: foragers (Greenlandian anchor)
notes: Representative anchor for predominantly foraging societies; total includes food + wood burning.

label: early agrarian states (Northgrippian anchor)
notes: Representative anchor for early agrarian/state-level societies.

label: Meghalayan average (Holocene to ~1950)
notes: Long-run Holocene average to ~1950 as summarized in the source.

label: pre-industrial (1670–1850 midpoint)
notes: Pre-industrial interval midpoint; rising use of coal + water/steam precursors.

label: industrial interval (1850–1950 midpoint)
notes: Industrial interval midpoint; coal + oil/gas + early electrification.

label: modern (since 1950 average; plotted as ~2000 anchor)
notes: Post-1950 Anthropocene-era average per capita energy use (range varies by country/time).
